title: Divine Ganesha Kasu Mala: A Touch of Tradition & Sparkle
features: This exquisite Kasu Mala features intricately designed gold coins (kasulu) adorned with shimmering Cubic Zirconia, interspersed with delicate mango (paisley) motifs, also with CZ stones, adding a touch of modern elegance to the traditional design. The central pendant showcases a finely detailed Lord Ganesha motif. Each element is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, known for their expertise in jewelry making. The floral-shaped pendants are surrounded with coral beads, adding a touch of tradition and auspiciousness. Small Gold beads are hanged in the pendant for added detail and rich look.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for engagements
description: This Kasu Mala is more than just a piece of jewelry; it's a symbol of prosperity, good fortune, and divine blessings. The exquisite craftsmanship, combined with the auspiciousness of Lord Ganesha and the vibrant colors, makes it a truly unique and valuable addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine and durability.
